segments.text: I see the boy balancing on that stool, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching so high for the cookie jar, and the stool is about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, not even noticing how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should turn around and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the sink, and the floor is getting slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman’s foot is already wet, but she’s just focused on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, but inside, it’s pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone is going to notice before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR
